According to Mr Zahi Hawass , the Egyptian Museum` s collection is secure from thieves. He said the greatest threat to the collection inside was posed by the torched ruling party headquarters building next door. What scares me is that if this building is destroyed, it will fall over the museum, Mr Zahi Hawass said.
